title: Ward Skins - WHERE?
body:
I can't change my ward skins in the champion select and I don't know where I can anymore. Has this disappeared for other people or am I just missing something.

Sorry if this is a dumb post but I can't find them and I is sad :(

replies.body: So is like if i buy a car but when i want to drive it the car dissapeart and i cant drive .....

It is a confirmed that a bug has appeared that causes some ward skins not to appear in your inventory and they have been investigating it. The wards are still on the accounts, it is just not shown on the menus. In some cases people can't change wards in champ select either.

[Don't worry, Riot are aware of the issue and are working to fix it](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us).

Yeah I noticed the same thing 2 nights ago, it's strange to look at without the ward skins in champ select, If you want to change ward skins you could always go to shop and click on a ward skin that you own and select it as your current one. I'm assuming there was a bug relating to the ward selection and that's why they removed it.
